Row.Text: [B]Naval units[/B] were an important part of the [B]Viking[/B] identity.

{1_Civilization_Adj} Naval spread terror among their rivals. Even the hint of an approaching navy is enough to make mayors and viceroys weak. With its rise, a new line of experts in conquest arise, seeking to make their voices heard.
You have unlocked the Vikings by having 3 Naval units.
[B]Friedrich[/B] was from the same continent as the [B]Vikings[/B].
[B]Charlemagne[/B] was from the same continent as the [B]Vikings[/B].
[B]Friedrich[/B] was from the same continent as the [B]Vikings[/B].
